GeneralInfo.Name: Pandora MusicBox
GeneralInfo.Author: John Conrad, Travis Collins
GeneralInfo.ExtensionDescription: Pandora MusicBox is a plugin that will allow you to listen to Pandora Radio inside MediaPortal. While the plugin currently has a limited feature set you can currently manage and listen to existing stations on your account.

SectionParam.Name: Icon
SectionParam.Description: The icon file of the package (jpg,png,bmp)

SectionParam.Name: Online Icon
SectionParam.Description: The icon file of the package stored online (jpg,png,bmp)

SectionParam.Name: Configuration file
SectionParam.Description: The file used to configure the extension. If have .exe extension the will be executed If have .dll extension used like MP plugin configuration

SectionParam.Name: Online Screenshots
SectionParam.Description: Online stored screenshot urls separated by ;

SectionParam.Name: Force to uninstall on update
SectionParam.Description: Show dialog and force to uninstall previous version when updating an extension. Should only be disabled if you are using an NSIS/MSI installer.

GeneralInfo.Name: Pandora MusicBox
GeneralInfo.Author: John Conrad, Travis Collins
GeneralInfo.ExtensionDescription: Pandora MusicBox is a plugin that will allow you to listen to Pandora Radio inside MediaPortal. While the plugin currently has a limited feature set you can currently manage and listen to existing stations on your account.
GeneralInfo.VersionDescription: Fixed bug causing fan art to not load properly when using this plugin in conjunction with Fanart Handler.

SectionParam.Description: The icon file of the package (jpg,png,bmp)

GeneralInfo.VersionDescription: Fixed bug causing playback to stop after some advertisements.

GeneralInfo.Name: Pandora MusicBox
GeneralInfo.Author: John Conrad, Travis Collins
GeneralInfo.ExtensionDescription:
Pandora MusicBox is a plugin that will allow you to listen to Pandora Radio inside MediaPortal. While the plugin currently has a limited feature set you can currently manage and listen to existing stations on your account.
Currently Pandora is a service only offered in the United States.
GeneralInfo.VersionDescription: * Fixes album art retrieval. * Improves GUI responsiveness when communicating with the server.

SectionParam.Description: The icon file of the package stored online (jpg,png,bmp)

SectionParam.Name: Force to uninstall on update
SectionParam.Description: Show dialog and force to uninstall previous version when updating an extension. Should only be disabled if you are using an NSIS/MSI installer.
